# GRAPHICS::SCALEFORM_MOVIE_METHOD_ADD_PARAM_LATEST_BRIEF_STRING

## Summary
Allows you to pass the latest help text string (of the passed type) to a scaleform method

## Parameters
* **BRIEF_TYPE** briefType
